articles.title: Golden Globes Make Demi Moore an Oscar Frontrunner, Boost ‘Emilia Pérez’ and ‘The Brutalist’ in Best Picture Race - Variety
articles.description: Golden Globes analysis: Demi Moore is now a best actress frontrunnner, with 'Emilia Perez' and 'The Brutalist' getting best picture boosts.
articles.content: In a year where clear frontrunners have been slow to emerge, the Golden Globes offered crucial hints about which films and performances might emerge to lead awards season. Demi Moore appears to be th… [+5699 chars]

articles.title: ‘Emilia Perez’ and Demi Moore win big at the awards - The Washington Post
articles.description: “The Brutalist,” “Emilia Pérez,” “Hacks,” “Shogun” and “Baby Reindeer” earned top prizes at the 2025 Golden Globes.
articles.content: Okay, the Globes are not perfect Oscars predictors, but we got some major insights into the way the race is leaning. With Brady Corbets win for director, Adrien Brodys win for male actor in a drama a… [+1117 chars]

articles.title: Aubrey Plaza misses Golden Globes following death of husband, director Jeff Baena - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: Aubrey Plaza was slated to present at tonight's Golden Globes, but skipped the ceremony following the death of her husband, the indie film director Jeff Baena, on Saturday.
articles.content:
